widgets.title: Are We Growing?
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Visiting At The Same Time?
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) from PageView TIMESERIES AUTO COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Are They Staying As Long?
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView TIMESERIES AUTO COMPARE WITH 1 week ago

widgets.title: Visiting From?
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView facet countryCode since 1 week ago Limit 5

widgets.title: What Do They Use?
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView facet userAgentName SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Where Do They Go In Prod?
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(session) FROM PageView facet appName since 1 week ago

widgets.title: What are our users experiencing?
widgets.nrql: select average(duration) FROM PageView FACET userAgentName TIMESERIES 1 minute
